Pragya recently finished her masters in Artificial Intelligence at Imperial College London. 
Prior to that, she finished her undergraduate in Engineering Physics from IIT Roorkee and worked as a quantitative researcher at Goldman Sachs.
Her research interests include geometric and topological machine learning, especially their applications to natural sciences.
